formatted_address: 5 Stadium Walk, # 01-23 Leisure Park Kallang, Singapore 397693
name: Guardian Health & Beauty - Kallang Leisure Park

reviews.text: Aaron is knowledgeable in-store products and proactive in customer service. This is the first time i tried the Yuu app for purchase and points accumluation , Thks for his clear explanation. He is a helpful and abled  staff , I am pleased with his service provided at the kallang leisure mall outlet.

Smaller than average, but convenient outlet which has most of the items you need from a drugstore. Be careful to check the receipt as some of the offers which are advertised at the shelf are not reflected in their system, so the cashier may charge you the original higher price by accident. Better to check the receipt to make sure.

Would love to compliment a lady cashier staff from this outlet. At around 2.45pm on 27/08 I entered the outlet and asked the lady staff if there‚Äôs Aveeno travel size for sale. She told me only left the baby series (which I already have). After wandering myself awhile, she asked me to the counter and passed me 2 of these travel size Aveeno Skin Relief which I was looking for. She told me these are free samples. I felt so lucky already as I‚Äôve been searching this series for my eczema child at many outlets to no avail, and she could have not bothered to let me know about the free samples too. This kind gesture is worth being mentioned. Thank you lady staff, you made my day.‚ù§Ô∏è

I frequent the Guardian store at Kallang Leisure Centre for its wide range & convenient location. However the Main reason is due to the helpful service staff, especially Ms Joyce Goh. She is always very friendly and helpful, providing assistance in locating & recommending the appropriate item. I am very grateful for the help & advice provided by Joyce. Thank you üôè
Another Guardian ‚Äòpharmacy‚Äô location at the Singapore Sports Hub - located at the Kallang Leisure Mall.  Limited items on offer, and no pharmacist kn site.
